0011011100010000 0100100010001111 0 -> sum: 0111111110011111, cout: 0
1010001110001101 1010000101101001 0 -> sum: 0100010011110110, cout: 1

0110101100001000 1111101000110011 0 -> sum: 0110010100111011, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
